EmailTemplate.subject: The Sky Is No Longer the Limit with JetWave

<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> <[[https://comlux.com/]]>
If you still believe that “take-off” means “turn-off” then it’s time to think again. Passengers are now demanding to stay connected whenever and wherever they are. Fortunately, the age of global, reliable, high-speed airborne connectivity is upon us – and it’s now available for your BBJ aircraft through Comlux Completion.
JetWave™ is the hardware solution facilitating connection to Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service, delivering an in-the-air broadband experience comparable to on-the-ground connections. By selecting JetWave, you’ll be enabling your passengers with ‘office equivalent’ productivity and ‘home-equivalent’ connectivity. For the ultimate entertainment and connectivity experience, pair your JetWave system with Honeywell's Ovation Select cabin management system.
Upgrade to JetWave now and save on your Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan, plus write off up to 100% of equipment purchases for business aircraft thanks to 2018 changes to U.S. tax rules.
There has never been a better time to upgrade your in-flight Wi-Fi. Contact Comlux Completion to find out how you can get connected.
